languages.text: Молитвы преподобной Арабеллы вдохновляют экипаж истреблять врагов Императора и обслуживать орудия гнева Его с особой тщательностью.
The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.
languages.original_text: Молитвы преподобной Арабеллы вдохновляют экипаж истреблять врагов Императора и обслуживать орудия гнева Его с особой тщательностью.

traits.locale_text: The prayers of Reverend Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.
The prayers of Reverend Arabella inspired the crew to purge the foes of the God-Emperor.

The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.

languages.text: Die Gebete von Konfessorin Arabella haben die Crew dazu gebracht, alle Feinde des Gottimperators zu vernichten und den Waffen Seines Zorns mit beispielhaftem Eifer zu dienen.
languages.original_text: The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.

traits.locale_text: Die Gebete von Konfessorin Arabella haben die Crew dazu gebracht, alle Feinde des Gottimperators zu vernichten und den Waffen Seines Zorns mit beispielhaftem Eifer zu dienen.

languages.text: Las oraciones de la confesora Arabella han inspirado a la tripulación para purgar a todos y cada uno de los enemigos del Dios Emperador y ocuparse con rigor ejemplar del mantenimiento de las armas que desatan Su cólera.
languages.original_text: The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.

traits.locale_text: Las oraciones de la confesora Arabella han inspirado a la tripulación para purgar a todos y cada uno de los enemigos del Dios Emperador y ocuparse con rigor ejemplar del mantenimiento de las armas que desatan Su cólera.

languages.text: アラベラ司祭の祈りは、神帝陛下のすべての敵を粛清し、模範的な厳格さで神帝陛下の怒りの武器に奉仕せよと、クルーを鼓舞した。
languages.original_text: The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.

traits.locale_text: アラベラ司祭の祈りは、神帝陛下のすべての敵を粛清し、模範的な厳格さで神帝陛下の怒りの武器に奉仕せよと、クルーを鼓舞した。

languages.text: 告解神父阿拉贝拉的祈祷唤醒了船员心中的狂热，号召他们成为神皇忠仆的典范，肃清祂的所有敌人。
languages.original_text: The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.

traits.locale_text: 告解神父阿拉贝拉的祈祷唤醒了船员心中的狂热，号召他们成为神皇忠仆的典范，肃清祂的所有敌人。

languages.text: Les prières de la confesseure Arabella ont incité l'équipage à éliminer systématiquement tous les adversaires de l'Empereur-Dieu et à entretenir les armes de Sa sainte colère avec une rigueur exemplaire.
languages.original_text: The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.

traits.locale_text: Les prières de la confesseure Arabella ont incité l'équipage à éliminer systématiquement tous les adversaires de l'Empereur-Dieu et à entretenir les armes de Sa sainte colère avec une rigueur exemplaire.

languages.text: Günah Çıkarıcı Arabella'nın duaları, mürettebatı Tanrı İmparator'un her türlü düşmanını yok etmek ve O'nun gazabını taşıyan silahların bakımını muazzam bir şevkle yapmak konusunda motive etti.
languages.original_text: The prayers of Confessor Arabella have roused the crew to purge any and all foes of the God-Emperor and service the weapons of His wrath with exemplary rigour.
